author: akhukhun
body: Moving factor of 2 from the HF TP emulation algorithm to the compression LUTs to match what is done online. MC and emulated TP energies will remain unchanged up-to rounding, but emulated TPs will match data exactly after the change. No change in TP scale (no change needed in Layer-1 tables).
title: adjust HF TP emulator and compression LUTs
